About.about_myself: I am a graphic designer and my goal is to make the world a better place through art and design. I specialize in branding, print design, web design, and illustrations. I create custom designs that help my clients grab the attention of their audience and scale their business.

work_experience.title: Graphic Designer
work_experience.text: Creation of design of leaflets, catalogues. Construction tool branding. Package design. 3D modeling of accessories (Cinema 4d). Photo retouching. Rebranding from TM Foresta to Dnipro-M. Website banner. Merch (cups, t-shirts, paper clips...) Layout of instructions for tool.

work_experience.title: Graphic Designer
work_experience.text: Creation or resize of graphic layouts. Designing sales points according to the brand book. Layout of presentations. There was an opportunity to cooperate with such brands as: NESCAFE, Nesquik, Lion, Purina ONE, PRO PLAN, Gourmet, Friskies, Dog Chow, Nestle, Fitness, Optimeal.
